EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to by Primary Applicant to invite users for their child organizations
EmailTemplate.name: ChildOrgUserEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: Invite Primary Users for Child Organizations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Invite Additional Users Within The Organization
Hello {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You are invited to become an user.
Please click on the url below to create your login account to register as an External User in the Enterprise Management System (EGMS), which will be used to manage the entire application intake and evaluation process.
You will be prompted to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement and Conflict of Interest Agreement.
Click here
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
